tacticulous.game.graphicalui

Class ActionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tacticulous.game.graphicalui.ActionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener

    public class ActionController
extends Object
implements ActionListener
    Main control and logic class for graphical user interface.
    Author:
    O

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActionController

        public ActionController(Game game,
                JComponent map,
                JButton nextUnit,
                JButton previousUnit,
                JButton move,
                JButton attack,
                JButton delay,
                JButton endTurn,
                JButton takeTurn,
                JButton autoTurn,
                JTextArea active,
                JTextArea target,
                JTextArea log)
        Parameters:
        game - provides access to necessary data
        map - provides access to map display
        nextUnit - select next unit button
        previousUnit - select previous unit button
        move - move unit button
        attack - attack target button
        delay - delay acting for now button
        endTurn - end current unit's turn button
        takeTurn - AI player takes turn
        autoTurn - AI player will forevermore take turn automatically
        active - displays current unit's description
        target - displays current target tile's and unit's description
        log - displays game events.
